title: Cardano expands, investors eye Domini.art’s growth
description: Cardano's approach might be a model for emerging crypto projects but Domini.art's ongoing presale is drawing more investors

title: From Blind Confidence to Educated Optimism – Navigating Obstacles for Institutional DLT Adoption in Finance
description:
The finance and fintech news of late 2022 and early 2023 may have created uncertainty for some financial institutions and digital assets skeptics. Nonetheless, it facilitated the historical transition from blind confidence to educated optimism surrounding cutting-edge financial technologies, particularly DLT (distributed-ledger technology). Those closely monitoring the financial landscape today witness rising opportunities for institutional […]

The post From Blind Confidence to Educated Optimism – Navigating Obstacles for Institutional DLT Adoption in Finance appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
